name: The Tower (itch) (gabefulk8)
description: The Tower is a short parkour game that I developed throughout the Fall 2021 semester for my Game Development class. My vision for the game as I was making it was "Jump King but 3D", something that can be beaten quickly if you are good enough at it, but takes a while to master. The game features a local leaderboard so you can track and keep track of your best times. Thanks for checking out my game, and I hope you enjoy it!
